description: Try our easy to follow Middle Eastern-Style Apricot Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Middle Eastern-Style Apricot Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Release pressure and remove lid. Add reserved apricots and simmer for 10 minutes or until sauce is thickened. Top with yoghurt and almonds and serve with Lebanese bread.
